about_the_game:
Noland Ridge: Once a gleaming metropolis, now shrouded in a toxic tomb, a testament to ambition's rampage and vengeance.

You are Nomad, a victim of the chaos, driven by a city's desperate plea and a legacy whispered by your grandfather. Fragmented memories ignite your purpose, fueling your fight.

Unmasking the Conspiracy:

Without getting seen, hack into energy towers to access restricted zones and unravel the tangled web of deceit shrouding Noland's demise. Decipher cryptic messages that weave a narrative of scientific arrogance, festering grudges, and a once-great city's tragic fall. Hear the city's final, gut-wrenching cries and the chilling pronouncements of a corrupt corporation.

Mastering the Urban Jungle:

Utilize your arsenal of parkour prowess honed through rooftop survival - scale walls, launch yourself with grappling hooks, dash with blazing speed, and defy gravity with gliding maneuvers to navigate the treacherous environment and decaying structures.

Eerie wisps weave through the deserted city streets. Are they fragments of forgotten memories, or phantoms searching for solace? Follow their spectral trail to sharpen your parkour skills.

A Captain's Descent:

A storm-tossed captain crashed his ship into Noland's maximum-security prison, carrying a mysterious crystal pulsing with power. Mistaken for an escapee, he unleashed the crystal's energy for his freedom. Consumed by frustration and spite, he transformed into a power-hungry maniac, seizing control of the prison, then the entire city. But his dominion came at a dreadful cost: he became dependent on the crystal for survival, shrouding the city in a toxic cloud breathable only by the mutated.

Mutated Mayhem:

The misuse of the crystal's power has unleashed a horrific consequence. Mutated inmates now roam free, twisted monstrosities fueled by the captain’s influence. They target anyone who tries to oppose his agenda.

Hope in the Shadows:

Use the shadows to your advantage. Stalk your prey unseen and unleash devastating stealth takedowns to eliminate mutated threats. Every enemy neutralized weakens their hold on the city and levels the battlefield for your final confrontation.



Will you honor your grandfather's legacy and become a beacon of hope?

The fate of Noland Ridge rests on your shoulders.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 13100 or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or higher

short_description: Explore, fight and survive on the rooftops of Noland Ridge, a city turned into a science experiment. In this Open World, Stealth-Adventure game with a Retro look, you are free to explore the map however and whenever you want!
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese
